review: My smile makeover was greatly done. The overall treatment was very satisfactory and was completed much earlier than expected. Even the tooth extraction was painless and moreover the braces were very comfortable. I m very happy with the treatment. I would really recommend them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Did root canal for both my elderly parents by Dr. Ankita. It was done with utmost care and professionally during this period of pandemic. I would highly recommend her and Dr. Abhishek for your dental treatments.

review: Did root canal for both my elderly parents by Dr. Ankita. It was done with utmost care and professionally during this period of pandemic. I would highly recommend her and Dr. Abhishek for your dental treatments.

My kid had lot of pain. She was not able to chew on food and sleep at night. She is 3.5yr old. And was not able to sit for a long time for her dental treatment. On our friends recommendation we consulted Dr Ankita Chauhan for her treatment under general anethesia. She is very polite and explained us the procedure very well and made us feel very comfortable throughout. *** ** *** **** **** ******* ** **********
